channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: HP OmniBook X Flip 14 Review: Flip Flop
item.description: This 2-in-1 laptop is a blast from the past—and not always in a good way.

item.title: The Demise of China’s Hottest Online Shopping Craze
item.description: As China’s digital economy matures, community group-buying platforms are being replaced by faster, more convenient delivery services.

item.title: Indian crypto exchange CoinDCX confirms $44 million stolen during hack
item.description: The crypto exchange, the largest in India, said it plans to absorb the costs of the breach.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg Is Expanding His Secretive Hawaii Compound. Part of It Sits Atop a Burial Ground
item.description: Meta’s CEO has become one of the biggest landowners in Hawaii, growing his property’s footprint and erecting new mysterious buildings.

item.title: From idea to first check: Raising pre-seed and seed capital with Charles Hudson and Navin Chaddha at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: More than 10,000 founders, investors, and tech insiders will convene at Moscone West in San Francisco from October 27-29 for TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 —...

item.title: Dia launches a skill gallery, Perplexity to add tasks to Comet
item.description: The Browser Company has launched an official repository of "skills" for its Dia browser — shortcuts for prompts that are used frequently.

item.title: Hisense U8QG TV Review: Beautifully Bright, Tough to Tame
item.description: Hisense's latest U8 TV serves up a brightness bonanza, but it's not for the timid.

item.title: Don’t miss your chance to exhibit at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 is just around the corner, and with more than 10,000 startup and VC leaders heading to Moscone West in San Francisco this Octo...

item.title: Our 9 Favorite Pizza Ovens: Wood, Gas, Electric, and Grill (2025)
item.description: Craving carb-y comfort? We picked our favorite outdoor ovens for backyards, countertops, or camping.

item.title: New zero-day bug in Microsoft SharePoint under widespread attack
item.description: Security researchers say Microsoft customers should take immediate action to defend against the ongoing cyberattacks, and must assume they have alread...
